#include <iostream>
#include <sstream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstring>
#include <string>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <stack>
#include <vector>
#include <queue>

using namespace std;

typedef long long LL;
const LL INF = (1000000009);
#define SLL ({LL x;scanf("%lld",&x);x;})
#define MP make_pair
#define PB push_back
#define all(x) (x).begin(), (x).end()
#define rall(x) (x).rbegin(), (x).rend()
#define getSize(x) ((int) (x).size()) 
typedef pair<int,int> PII;

LL binpow(LL a, LL n)
{
     LL res = 1;
     while (n) {
	  if (n & 1)
	       res = (res*a)%INF;
	  a = (a*a)%INF;
	  n >>= 1;
     }
     return res;
}


LL N, K;
int main(int argc, char** argv)
{
     N = SLL, K = SLL;
     K = binpow(2, K) - 1LL;
     
     LL res = 1;
     for(LL i = 0; i < N; ++i)
	  res = (res * max(K - i, 0LL)) % INF;
     printf("%lld\n", res);
     return 0;
}
